198050.「…………いってぇーーッ。\n やべ アタマ打ったわ……死ぬかも。:
Ouuuuch.... Man, I hit my head... I might
die...

198051.「ハハッ <pc>っちも\n バナナの皮 踏んづけて 転んだのか～。\n やっぱ:
Hahaha <pc> you also stepped on a
Banana Peel and fell down~? I guess a gadabout
has to step on it, right?

198053.「な…なんでやねん！ アホちゃうかァ ワレ！！\n そこで バナナの皮で ズッコ:
Why... why? Are you stupid! You said there was
a gadabout who died from falling on his banana
peel!

198054.「ワイは 置いてあるモン 取ってこい\n 言うたのに なに踏んでんねん！！\n:
I told you to go get the stuff you left
behind, but what are you stepping on? And
you're so fucking stupid!

198055.「……チクショーーーッ！\n お題を無視するだけやのうて 死をもおそれず\n 遊:
Damn it! Not only do you ignore the subject,
but you are willing to play with death...
Kaku, asshole!<me 71>

198056.「おっ！ マジか！\n やったな <pc>っち！！\n イマドキの遊び人のチカラ:
Whoa! You did it! Way to go, <pc>!
You just proved the power of the Trendy
Gadabout!

198057.「うふ…… 今回の試練は アナタたちの\n 遊び人としての度量を 試していたのだ:
Well... this trial was meant to test your
gadabout skills, but alas, it looks like you
passed...<heart>

198058.「……だ…だが まだやでッ！\n 試練が ひとつだとは ひと言もゆーてへん！\n:
But not yet! I never said it was just one
trial. I haven't even acknowledged that you're
a true gadabout yet.

198059.「ルッチーちゃ～んっ！！\n たいへん！！ たいへんなの～っ！！: Lucchie~! Oh my God! Oh my God~!

198060.「ゴ…ゴランゾちゃんが……\n 労魔デスワークに 襲われたの！！: Golanzo was attacked by Labor Demon Deathwork!

198062.「ゴラちゃん……遊びから 戻ってきたと思ったら\n 急に 遊び人をやめて 働くん:
Gora... she came back from her gadabout and suddenly she said she was going to stop being a gadabout and start working, and I didn't
know what to do. I don't know what to do...

198063.「オイッ！！\n アンタたちが 何かしたんじゃねーだろーな！？: Hey! You didn't do something to me, did you?

198064.「ハ…ハァ～？ ジョーダンはヨシコさんやで！？\n ワイら ずっと この場所にお:
Ha...huh? Jordan is Yoshiko! We've been in
this place the whole time! We can't just
attack our own companion!

198065.「疑うのも わかんなくはないけど～\n これだけは 信じてほしいの……\n アタ:
I understand your doubts, but please believe
me when I tell you that we are not death
work~<heart>

198066.「アリバイありってことか。\n ……わかった。\n アンタたちの言うことを 信じ: So you have an alibi. Okay. I'll believe you.

198068.「えーと ゴラちゃんは……グレン城の\n 武器鍛冶ギルドで 働くって言ってたかな:
Let's see, Gora-chan...I think she said she
works at the Weaponsmith Guild in Glen
Castle...

198069.「<pc>っち…… デスワークに襲われた\n ゴランゾのことが とにかく 心配だ:
<pc>... I'm worried about Golanzo who
was attacked by Death Work. Let's go to the
Weaponsmith Guild in Glen Castle.

198070.「今日中に……\n どうのつるぎ★３を……５００本……\n 作らなくては……ブツ:
I have to make 500 Copper Swords 3... by the
end of the day... mumble mumble mumble... ...

198071.「……おいおい ゴランゾ～。\n いったい どうしちまったんだよ。\n なに こ:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, Golanzo~! What the hell is
wrong with you? What are you doing playing
around here~?

198072.「……おや ルッチー氏。\n いつも お世話になっております。:
...Oh, Mr. Lucchie. Thank you for all your
help.

198073.「ですが ちがいますよ ルッチー氏。\n 遊んでいるのではなくて 働いているので:
But no, Mr. Lucchie. I'm not playing, I'm
working. I've stopped being a gadabout.

198075.「あっ そうでした……これは 不覚。\n 親方に 素材の調達を 頼まれていました:
Oh, that's right...this was an accident. I was
asked by my master to procure materials.

198076.「……ということで ルッチー氏。\n 今まで お世話になりました。\n 私は 仕:
So, Mr. Lucchie. Thank you very much for all
the help you have given me. I'm busy with
work, so I'll leave you now.

198077.「もう イヤ……。\n あたしも 遊び人やめる。: I don't want to be a gadabout anymore.

198079.「デスワークに 襲われたら……あんなふうに\n 自分じゃないみたいに なっちゃう:
If a death work attacked me... it would be
like I wasn't myself, you know? If it was a
gadabout, I'd be taken by him, too.

198080.「あたしは ただ みんなと一緒に\n 楽しいことをして 遊びたいだけなのに……。:
All I want to do is play and have fun with you
guys, but I can't stand this... I can't take
it anymore!

198083.「ほーれ 言わんこっちゃあらへんわァ。\n 遊びクラブとやらも 解散やな～。:
Well, I won't say it. I guess this play club
will be disbanded.

198084.「せやから 遊び人はやめとけ いうたやろ～？\n 遊び人なんて ロクなこと ない:
That's why I told you not to be a gadabout, remember? Being a gadabout is not a good thing. Even if you have fun now, you'll regret
it later.

198085.「そうよ～ アナタだって もう大人でしょ～？\n 遊び人だなんて ふざけたことし:
That's right~ You're an adult now, aren't you?
Stop playing around like a gadabout and get
real, okay?

198086.「そや そや！ 言うたれ！ 遊び人なんてな～\n くさった死体にたかる ハエのよ:
Yes, yes! Say it! A gadabout is like a fly on
a Walking Corpse! You can stop now!

198088.「おいおいおい まさか……\n どいつもこいつも 似たようなことばかり\n 言い:
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,
no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no,
no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.

198089.「アンタたち……ペアレンツ？\n ……父ちゃんと 母ちゃんなのか？: You... parents? ...are you father and mother?

198090.「ハ…ハァ～！？ ジョーダンはヨシコさんや！\n んなワケあらへんわ！！:
Ha...huh! Jordan is Yoshiko! There's no way
that's possible!

198091.「あはっ ちょっと急用 思いだしちゃったゾ～<heart>\n それじゃ バイバ:
I just remembered something urgent~<heart> See you
later...!

198097.「アハハハ！ ペアレンツ 遊び人だったんかよ！\n つまんねー親だとばっかり 思:
Ahahaha! Parents, you're such a gadabout! I
thought they were just boring parents, but...
they're really funny!

198098.「や…やかましいわ！\n これは お前のためを思って\n やっていたことなんだぞ:
You're being so... noisy! I was doing this for
your own good!

198099.「そうよ！ 遊び人を襲うデスワークの話を知って\n あなたの身を案じたから ひと:
That's right! When I heard about the death work attacking gadabouts, I feared for your safety, so I put on a show to get the gadabout
to stop!

198100.「……私たちは たしかに 昔 遊び人だった。\n だが やみくもに遊びまわってい:
It's true that we used to be gadabouts. But one day, while playing around hastily, I fell on a banana in an Abandoned Castle and hit my
head.

198101.「なあ ルッチー…… もう一度 問おう。\n 私たちの過ちを くり返してほしくな:
Look, Lucchie... let me ask you one more time.
I don't want you to repeat our mistakes. Are
you still willing to stop being a gadabout?

198102.「……忠告ありがとよ～。でも オレっちは\n いつでも ガチで 遊び人やってんだ:
Thanks for the advice. But I've always been a real gadabout. I've made up my mind that this is what I'm going to do for the rest of my
life!

198103.「それに デスワークのヤローを ぶっ飛ばして\n 遊びクラブの仲間を 元に戻す仕:
Besides, I still have a job to do, which is to beat the hell out of the Death Workers and get my play club buddies back together. So I ain't
never gonna stop being a gadabout!

198104.「そうか…… そこまで言うのならば 仕方ない。\n 私たちのふたりの血を 受け継:
Well... if you insist that much, I have no
choice. With the blood of both of us in your
veins, you may be a gadabout by nature.

198105.「デスワークを倒す……と言ったな。\n ならば 私たちが 現役時代に編みだした\:
You said you were going to defeat death work. Then let me give you some gadabout tricks we developed in our working days. It should come
in handy.

198106.「うおお なんだこれ スゲーッ！！\n バイブス アガってきたーーーッ！！:
Oh, what the hell is this? Vibes are getting
agitated!

198107.ルッチーは 遊び人の必殺技\nパルプンテを 習得した！<me 71>:
Lucchie has learned the gadabout's special
move, Hocus Pocus!<me 71>

198108.「っしゃー！ このチカラで デスワークを\n ぶっ飛ばして みんなを 元通りにし:
Yes! I'm going to use my powers to blow the
death work out of the water and put everyone
back to normal! Dad, Mom... thank you so much!

198109.「<pc>っちも あんがとな！\n お礼したいから 遊びハウスまで 来てくれよ。:
Thanks again, <pc>! I want to thank
you, so please come to the Gadabode. I'll see
you soon!

204435.「その時……世の無常と 真理の道を悟ってな。\n じつは 試練の中にあった 死ん:
That's when I realized the impermanence of the world and the way of truth. As it turns out, the dead gadabouts in the trial were those of
us who died as gadabouts.
